p: Based on the above analysis, combining the versatility of the electrospinning technique and hydrothermal growth enables the fabrication of MO/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures. Evidently, no surface pretreatments are needed to introduce new surface functional groups or additional covalent and/or noncovalent interconnectivity in our experiments. Subsequently, we take Co 3O 4/TiO 2 hierarchical heterostructures as an example and investigate the formation mechanism of hierarchical heterostructures, as illustrated in Figure 6.
